my pet rock jenna talia was such a big trump stan from the start. i told her not to stan him but she ignored me. i did everything to make her happy by editing photos of her next to him. she even smiled when she saw that pictures of the two of them together. she left me one day after writing a note that she would be going to his rally. she wanted to be right next to him in person and was hoping she would get a picture. she came after a week and she was all beat up and crying. she had been stepped on by trump and then it hurt her a lot and he just ignored her presence and had the audacity to spit on her as well. she then contracted covid-19 and died. now i have a burning passion of hate for this man. he is absolutely disgusting, a p3dophil3, r4p1st and much more terrible things. do not stan this man at all and he is disrespectful. even though biden is terrible vote for him. he has plans and DO NOT VOTE FOR KANYE.
